refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GEnum ├── GDBusMessageByteOrder ├── GDBusMessageHeaderField ╰── GDBusMessageType GFlags ╰── GDBusMessageFlags GObject ╰── GDBusMessage

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A type for representing D-Bus messages that can be sent or received on a GDBusConnection.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_new_signal ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GDBusMessage for a signal emission.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_new_method_call ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GDBusMessage for a method call.

entry.para: A valid D-Bus name or NULL.
A valid D-Bus interface name or NULL.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_new_method_reply ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GDBusMessage that is a reply to method_call_message .

entry.para: A message of type G_DBUS_MESSAGE_TYPE_METHOD_CALL to create a reply message to.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_new_method_error ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GDBusMessage that is an error reply to method_call_message .

entry.para: A message of type G_DBUS_MESSAGE_TYPE_METHOD_CALL to create a reply message to.
The D-Bus error message in a printf() format.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_new_method_error_valist ()
refsect2.para: Like g_dbus_message_new_method_error() but intended for language bindings.

entry.para: A message of type G_DBUS_MESSAGE_TYPE_METHOD_CALL to create a reply message to.
The D-Bus error message in a printf() format.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_new_method_error_literal ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GDBusMessage that is an error reply to method_call_message .

entry.para: A message of type G_DBUS_MESSAGE_TYPE_METHOD_CALL to create a reply message to.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_print ()
refsect2.para: Produces a human-readable multi-line description of message .
The contents of the description has no ABI guarantees, the contents and formatting is subject to change at any time. Typical output looks something like this:

informalexample.programlisting: Type: method-call Flags: none Version: 0 Serial: 4 Headers: path -> objectpath '/org/gtk/GDBus/TestObject' interface -> 'org.gtk.GDBus.TestInterface' member -> 'GimmeStdout' destination -> ':1.146' Body: () UNIX File Descriptors: (none)

Type: method-return Flags: no-reply-expected Version: 0 Serial: 477 Headers: reply-serial -> uint32 4 destination -> ':1.159' sender -> ':1.146' num-unix-fds -> uint32 1 Body: () UNIX File Descriptors: fd 12: dev=0:10,mode=020620,ino=5,uid=500,gid=5,rdev=136:2,size=0,atime=1273085037,mtime=1273085851,ctime=1272982635

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A string that should be freed with g_free().

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_locked ()
refsect2.para: Checks whether message is locked. To monitor changes to this value, conncet to the “notify” signal to listen for changes on the “locked” property.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if message is locked, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_lock ()
refsect2.para: If message is locked, does nothing. Otherwise locks the message.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_copy ()
refsect2.para: Copies message . The copy is a deep copy and the returned GDBusMessage is completely identical except that it is guaranteed to not be locked.
This operation can fail if e.g. message contains file descriptors and the per-process or system-wide open files limit is reached.

entry.para: Return location for error or NULL.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A new GDBusMessage or NULL if error is set. Free with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_byte_order ()
refsect2.para: Gets the byte order of message .

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_byte_order ()
refsect2.para: Sets the byte order of message .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A 8-bit unsigned integer (typically a value from the GDBusMessageType enumeration).

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_message_type ()
refsect2.para: Sets message to be of type .

entry.para: A 8-bit unsigned integer (typically a value from the GDBusMessageType enumeration).

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Flags that are set (typically values from the GDBusMessageFlags enumeration bitwise ORed together).

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_flags ()
refsect2.para: Sets the flags to set on message .

entry.para: Flags for message that are set (typically values from the GDBusMessageFlags enumeration bitwise ORed together).

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_body ()
refsect2.para: Gets the body of a message.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GVariant or NULL if the body is empty. Do not free, it is owned by message .

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_body ()
refsect2.para: Sets the body message . As a side-effect the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_SIGNATURE header field is set to the type string of body (or cleared if body is NULL).
If body is floating, message assumes ownership of body .

entry.para: Either NULL or a GVariant that is a tuple.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_unix_fd_list ()
refsect2.para: Gets the UNIX file descriptors associated with message , if any.
This method is only available on UNIX.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GUnixFDList or NULL if no file descriptors are associated. Do not free, this object is owned by message .

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_unix_fd_list ()
refsect2.para: Sets the UNIX file descriptors associated with message . As a side-effect the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_NUM_UNIX_FDS header field is set to the number of fds in fd_list (or cleared if fd_list is NULL).
This method is only available on UNIX.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_num_unix_fds ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_NUM_UNIX_FDS header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_num_unix_fds ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_NUM_UNIX_FDS header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_header_fields ()
refsect2.para: Gets an array of all header fields on message that are set.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: An array of header fields terminated by G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_INVALID. Each element is a guchar. Free with g_free().

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_header ()
refsect2.para: Gets a header field on message .
The caller is responsible for checking the type of the returned GVariant matches what is expected.

entry.para: A 8-bit unsigned integer (typically a value from the GDBusMessageHeaderField enumeration)

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A GVariant with the value if the header was found, NULL otherwise. Do not free, it is owned by message .

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_header ()
refsect2.para: Sets a header field on message .
If value is floating, message assumes ownership of value .

entry.para: A 8-bit unsigned integer (typically a value from the GDBusMessageHeaderField enumeration)
A GVariant to set the header field or NULL to clear the header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_destination ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_DESTINATION header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_destination ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_DESTINATION header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_error_name ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_ERROR_NAME header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_error_name ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_ERROR_NAME header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_interface ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_INTERFACE header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_interface ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_INTERFACE header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_member ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_MEMBER header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_member ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_MEMBER header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_path ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_PATH header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_path ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_PATH header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_reply_serial ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_REPLY_SERIAL header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_reply_serial ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_REPLY_SERIAL header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_sender ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_SENDER header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_sender ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_SENDER header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_signature ()
refsect2.para: Convenience getter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_SIGNATURE header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_set_signature ()
refsect2.para: Convenience setter for the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_SIGNATURE header field.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_get_arg0 ()
refsect2.para: Convenience to get the first item in the body of message .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The string item or NULL if the first item in the body of message is not a string.

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_to_blob ()
refsect2.programlisting: guchar * g_dbus_message_to_blob (GDBusMessage *message, gsize *out_size, GDBusCapabilityFlags capabilities, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Serializes message to a blob. The byte order returned by g_dbus_message_get_byte_order() will be used.

entry.para: Return location for size of generated blob.
A GDBusCapabilityFlags describing what protocol features are supported.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A pointer to a valid binary D-Bus message of out_size bytes generated by message or NULL if error is set. Free with g_free().

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_bytes_needed ()
refsect2.para: Utility function to calculate how many bytes are needed to completely deserialize the D-Bus message stored at blob .

entry.para: A blob representing a binary D-Bus message.
The length of blob (must be at least 16).
Return location for error or NULL.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: Number of bytes needed or -1 if error is set (e.g. if blob contains invalid data or not enough data is available to determine the size).

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_new_from_blob ()
refsect2.programlisting: GDBusMessage * g_dbus_message_new_from_blob (guchar *blob, gsize blob_len, GDBusCapabilityFlags capabilities, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GDBusMessage from the data stored at blob . The byte order that the message was in can be retrieved using g_dbus_message_get_byte_order().
If the blob cannot be parsed, contains invalid fields, or contains invalid headers, G_IO_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT will be returned.

entry.para: A blob representing a binary D-Bus message.
A GDBusCapabilityFlags describing what protocol features are supported.
Return location for error or NULL.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: A new GDBusMessage or NULL if error is set. Free with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: g_dbus_message_to_gerror ()
refsect2.para: If message is not of type G_DBUS_MESSAGE_TYPE_ERROR does nothing and returns FALSE.

Otherwise this method encodes the error in message as a GError using g_dbus_error_set_dbus_error() using the information in the G_DBUS_MESSAGE_HEADER_FIELD_ERROR_NAME header field of message as well as the first string item in message 's body.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if error was set, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: GDBusMessage
refsect2.para: The GDBusMessage structure contains only private data and should only be accessed using the provided API.

entry.para: The bus must not launch an owner for the destination name in response to this message.
If set on a method call, this flag means that the caller is prepared to wait for interactive authorization. Since 2.46.
The name of the error that occurred.
The serial number the message is a reply to.
The name the message is intended for.
Unique name of the sender of the message (filled in by the bus).
The signature of the message body.
The number of UNIX file descriptors that accompany the message.

refsect2.title: enum GDBusMessageByteOrder
refsect2.para: Enumeration used to describe the byte order of a D-Bus message.

entry.para: The byte order is big endian.
The byte order is little endian.
